lines.gurmukhi: jYsy sir sirqw skl mY smuMdR bfo myr mY sumyr bfo jgqu bKwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Sari Saritaa Sakal Mai Samoundr Bado , Mayr Mai Soumayr Bado Jagatu Bakhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as in the world, the sea is considered biggest among the lakes, rivers etc.; and Sumer mountain amongst all the mountains.

lines.gurmukhi: qrvr ibKY jYsy cMdn ibrKu bfo Dwqu mY knk Aiq auqm kY mwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Taravar Bikhai Jaisay Chandan Birakhu Bado , Dhaatu Mai Kanak Ati Outam Kai Maan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a sandalwood tree and gold is considered supreme amongst the trees and metals respectively.

lines.gurmukhi: pMCIAn mY hMs miRg rwjn mY swrdUl rwgn mY isrIrwgu pwrs pKwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Panchheean Mai Hans Mrig Raajan Mai Saaradoola , Raagan Mai Sireeraagu Paaras Pakhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as swan is supreme amongst the birds, the lion amongst the feline family, Sri Rag amongst the mode of singing and philosopher-stone among the stones.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwnn mY igAwnu Aru iDAwnn mY iDAwn gur skl Drm mY giHsqu pRDwn hY ]376]
lines.transliteration_english: Giaanan Mai Giaanu Aru Dhiaanan Mai Dhiaan Gur , Sakal Dharam Mai Grihasatu Pradhaan Hai ?376?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as the knowledge imparted by the True Guru is supreme of all knowledge, and concentration of mind on True Guru is superb, so is the family life ideal and superior of all the religions (ways of life).  (376)
